review: easy to use,even having never streamed tv before. we gave up cable cold turkey and were able to figure this out with no problems. we got amazon prime and hulu plus and the variety of programs and movies more than suits our needs. purchased one to be sure we liked it and now buying another for the other tv in the house! we are a small family witg two little ones so were not needing anything with games or headphone jacks or tons if memory....if that sounds like you...i highly recommend it....ditch cable, just pay for internet and stream all your favorite shows and movies!

author: Charmaine Beckford

review: Purchased this item in order to stream television and movie content to my TV and it works fantastic! Setup was a breeze, synced with my Amazon Prime and Pandora accounts and now I'm watching free shows and streaming music. Made it possible for me to utilize my older Yamaha stereo system, connected to my TV, in order to enjoy commercial free Pandora music on a system that had no computer interface. Definitely worth the price and getting me closer to allow my escape from cable!!
author: Mike EE

review: Originally had 2 Roku 3's before I bought this one. I love the Roku's. Easy to set up, works flawlessly, convenient. I use it for Amazon Instant Video, Hulu, YouTube, Netflix, Aereo, HBO, and many others. This streaming stick is perfect for anyone who wants basic video streaming without games or the ability to plug in usb hard drives. You plug the power cord, plug in the device to an HDMI slot on the TV, and follow the eas on screen prompts. I Highly recommend this and any other Roku devices.
author: Mongoose

review: After finding that my wifi was too weak for the back bedroom (where the Roku was going), I had to buy a wifi extender to go with my great router. Now, I have superb wifi throughout the house, and this still loses connection. Will continue to fiddle with it, but it does not work as described or hoped.However, when plugged into a TV very close to the router, this seems to work great and fast. I just don't need it in that TV.
